Review the Azure Readiness Guide to become familiar with the tools and approaches needed in landing zone creation.

Evaluate the CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint. If the assumptions and decisions in that article align to your business and technical objectives, the blueprint can be used to create your landing zone.
Review landing zone considerations to understand the alternative decisions which could impact your landing zone design.
Update the landing zone blueprint based on the impacted considerations and deploy the modified blueprint.

Develop a business case to validate the financial model supporting the motivations and outcomes.
In parallel to strategy and plan development, technical staff should begin implementation of a first adoption project to expand cloud skills.
